description: This file defines a Python class 'OpenAIEmbedder' that integrates with the OpenAI API to generate text embeddings. It manages API client configuration, sends requests to create embeddings, and retrieves embedding vectors along with usage data.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class that extends 'Embedder' to provide text embedding functionality using OpenAI's API, with configurable parameters and methods to retrieve embeddings and usage data.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the OpenAI client instance, configuring it with provided parameters.

methods.name: response
methods.description: Constructs and sends a request to the OpenAI API to create an embedding for the given text.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Retrieves the embedding vector for the provided text, handling exceptions and logging warnings.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Retrieves the embedding vector along with usage information for the provided text.
